channel.title: Season 3
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Season 3" - I am brand new to Season 3 and have 2 questions.

item.title: Re: Season 3
item.content:encoded:
1. Appetite is linked to rank. Genin get the least, Sannin get the most. So, after looping, you won't have much appetite.

2. Filler doesn't take that long, once it's unlocked. It's a pretty straight forward running challenge.

item.title: Season 3
item.content:encoded:
Okay now, I am brand new to Season 3 and have 2 questions.

1. I've always been a White Eye and am still a Genin, but why do I only have 100 appetite now?

2. How long will it take to beat the Filler Mission?
